name: What's Wrong With Me
description:
What's Wrong With Me   

Team Member：ZHANG Ruiqi, QIN Qing, NI Rongyuan, XUE Zhongzhu

Our game is based on rare symptoms as a framework and covers a variety of rare syndromes.

Each symptom is a parallel level, and each one develops a different gameplay based on the characteristics of the syndrome itself, including but not limited to puzzle solving, parkour, and maze etc... 

The game aims to appeal to people's attention and understanding of rare human symptoms, so that people may have more comprehension for  the behaviours of others people like them, and at the same time, make relevant patients who play games look at their special experiences in a normal and positive way.

 Players will be placed in an overhead room. There are a group of little guys  who have some different experiences from ordinary people, but they don't know what's wrong with them, so they feel annoyed and uneasy. 

Click on any character to enter their perspective. Maybe you will see something big to small, or you can hear an inexplicable voice. Maybe you can't help but ask: "What's wrong with me?!" 

You can use some clues and guidelines to discover the special gameplay of each level to complete it, and finally understand the special features of each syndrome.

 Next level, who will I be...?
